snippet.title: Factory Balls Walkthrough (All levels 1-20)
snippet.description:
Create the required ball in each level by dragging and dropping a plain ball over the tools available.
CREATED BY: Bart Bonte

You can play it here: http://www.notdoppler.com/factoryballs.php
More games: http://www.bontegames.com/

Factory Ball 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y9Z0E_oaV5E

Enjoy and have fun! :D
